column2: Active and appeared largely health apart from large tumor on back.
DCT-TVA; Braf CA; ink/arf f/f; pten f/f
Brain, lungs, heart, liver, kidneys, spleen, tumor
Very large tumors on back of head and neck. Lungs/heart looked normal- some small dark spots that may have been coagulated blood.  Skull was intact.
Two tumor chunks frozen, no cell line attempted
